description: A teacher at Touma`s school and a friend of Komoe. She is beautiful, has glamorous proportions, and is always seen with a green jersey. She is a member of the Anti-Skills and cares deeply for her students, and is apparently an active peacekeeper within the Academic City. A favor to her old friend, Yomikawa is asked by Yoshikawa Kikyou to take care of Accelerator and Last Order after they are released from the hospital.
name: Yomikawa Aiho
